name: Mapnik pygi map widget
tagline: A Python Mapnik-powered GTK3 map widget.
body:
MapnikPyGIMapWidget
===================

A Python Mapnik-powered GTK3 map widget.

![Screenshot of the map widget used in the example Python program.](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/599926/images/mapnik_pygi_map_widget_example.png)

Dependencies
------------

* Mapnik
* Gtk, Gdk, Pango, PangoCairo, Rsvg from gi.repository


Usage
----

See `example.py`. In order to run it you need some map data from NaturalEarthData (`ne_10m_admin_0_countries.zip`) which can be downloaded using `download_natural_earth_data.sh`.
